title: Tbh I miss supporting from Season 3
body:
I mean, at least then I could save the retarded team who wouldn't ward by lighting the map up like a Christmas tree myself.

If you want something done right, do it yourself.  Having to rely on your teammates to place wards cripples people in Bronze/Silver, where most don't even understand what the concept of a ward is except maybe a trinket, a not-upgraded trinket.
